<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Naderi (The Lost Maiden)](/Deities.aspx?ID=157)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Comfort and encourage lovers, help the suffering escape their circumstances in life or in death

**Anathema** Dismiss or mock a creature’s grief, separate lovers, torture a creature

**Follower Alignments**
NG, N, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

- **5th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57)

- **5th**
[Drop Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=92)

</column>
name: Naderi (The Lost Maiden)
